alert.note: Alert for Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Oakland County through 415 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clarkston, or 9 miles southeast of Holly, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Clarkston around 325 PM EDT. Pontiac around 340 PM EDT. Oxford around 345 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lakeville, Waterford, Davisburg, White Lake, Leonard, Rose Center, Lake Orion, Lake Angelus, Auburn Hills and Rochester Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
